1316670.name: DEEMO -Reborn- OST VOL.1
1316670.description:
本专辑为同名游戏《DEEMO -Reborn-》原声带，共收录12首曲目，均由知名创作者包含Laur，t+pazolite，計畫通行，Freeleaves，Iris，onoken，Apo11o program，MIDInco，Vintage_1073，柳田Ethnica，Spacebot (floating)所精心打造。

收錄曲目：

1. Me by Laur
2. Squeaky Mind by t+pazolite
3. Accelerando by 計畫通行
4. Dawn of the ruins by Freeleaves
5. Exodus by Iris
6. Mayoizuki by onoken feat. 実咲
7. Re:you～Even if one knew the world～ by Apo11o program＆ゆゆうた ft.OFFICE萬田(株)
8. saihate by Apo11o"QUASAR"program ft.遠藤駿
9. Creation of Fighters by Art of Fighters vs. Apo11o program + DD"ナカタ"Metal
10. Etude by MIDInco (Composer)、Vintage_1073 (Mastering)
11. Xing-Lai Heaven by 柳田Ethnica
12. Interstellar Exploration by Spacebot (floating)
